Intervention: - Single-arm positron emissions mammography and questionnaire
Administration of the positron emissions mammography questionnaire
Administration of the questionnaire: Questionnaire on patient satisfaction with mammography experience and mammography experience of positron emissions.
positron emission mammography: positron emission mammography once to compare recall rates with standard mammography
Eligibility: A screening mammogram is planned at one of the primary care clinics affiliated with the Boston Medical Centre and meets one of the following criteria:
1 of the following racial or ethnic origins, based on the country of birth of the patient or the country of birth of the mother and father:
No history of breast cancer, palpable breast mass, abnormal flow of nipples or other focal complaints justifying diagnostic mammography
